R

refreshGhostImage(Ghost) - Method in class ui.PrimaryStageController
This refresh the image of a determinate ghost that depends of the direction of its movement.
refreshLivesCounter() - Method in class ui.PrimaryStageController
This refresh the lives counter when Pacman gets or loss one.
register(ActionEvent) - Method in class ui.NameRegisterController
This method registers a new Player when this has died in the game.
restartMap() - Method in class model.Game
This restarts the map when Pacman dies or when the player wins.s
run() - Method in class threads.GhostThread
This moves the ghost with respect to its name and its state inside the game.
run() - Method in class threads.PacmanThread
This allows to move Pacman when the game starts.
